channel.title: How do you quote stuff in you sig?
channel.description: Tittle. I need help in adding a quote in my sig. How do I do it? I know where the quote is but how do I add it? I want it to have quote from --- on --- and so on

item.title: How do you quote stuff in you sig?
item.dc:creator: @2pure4u 2pure4u
item.description:
@2pure4u wrote:

Go to your profile and edit your sig… and to use a quote, copy and paste it in the right format.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you quote stuff in you sig?
